title: WSB's Weekend Bite: 2 Stocks For A Long Term Portfolio With Jeremy Kokemor
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description:
In this episode, we're joined by Jeremy Kokemor, Founder of Right Tail Capital, who pitches 2 stocks that he believes are great additions to your long-term portfolio. Plus, Jerry Kronenberg brings this week's Catalyst Watch and a recap of last weeks Twitter poll.
